data.name: beforeLabel
data.description: Custom content to display before the button label.

data.name: afterLabel
data.description: Custom content to display after the button label.

data.name: animate
data.description: Controls the animation speed of the button.

data.name: ariaLabel
data.description: Accessible label for the button, defaults to the button label if it's a string.

data.name: href
data.description: URL to navigate to when the button is clicked, converting the button into a link.

data.name: outline
data.description: Whether the button should have an outline style.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Specifies the rounded corners of the button.

data.name: shadow
data.description: Controls the shadow of the button.

data.name: size
data.description: Specifies the size of the button.

data.name: square
data.description: Whether the button should be a square.

data.name: theme
data.description: Theme of the button, determining its overall style.

data.name: color
data.description: The color of the button, indicating its purpose.

data.name: type
data.description: Specifies the type of button, such as button, submit, or reset.

data.name: beforeLabel
data.description: Custom content to display before the button label.

data.name: afterLabel
data.description: Custom content to display after the button label.
